charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1101_0100_:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] saw Klara
training with Slowbro.
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_0200_: That’s it, Slowbro! Use that epic poison move!
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_0300_:
Aw, come on! Can’t you at least try to be
more energetic?
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_0400_:
We gotta get way stronger and make ourselves
famous...
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_0500_:
Huh? [Name:PlayerNickname ]?! How long
have you been eavesdropping?!
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_0401_0700_:
Buzz off! I-it’s none of your business what I’m
up to!
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_0402_0900_: What?! You could’ve at least said something!
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_1000_: Uh...fine. You saw what you saw.
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_1100_:
There’s no point in asking you to forget everything,
so I’ll be honest with you...
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_1200_:
Almost every day since I came to Pasio, I’ve been
secretly working with Slowbro to better ourselves.
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_1300_:
Y’know why? To show up cheeky sync pairs
like you!
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_1400_:
A while ago, I used to think working hard was
kinda uncool.
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_1500_:
But after training at the Master Dojo, I learned the
importance of giving it my all.
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_1600_:
My partner here has tackled some real intense
training with me, y’know!
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_1700_: That’s how she got so big!
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_0301_1800_: So, she evolved from a Slowpoke?
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_0401_1900_: Yep! You have no idea how hard it was!
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_0402_2100_:
Uhh, how’d you come to THAT conclusion?! I’m just
saying she evolved from a Slowpoke, ’kay?
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_2200_:
When a Galarian Slowpoke gets bitten by
a Shellder...
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_2300_:
they say the spices inside its body start to
transform into poison.
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_2400_:
So, we’re even more toxic now than before!
Right, Slowbro?
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_2500_:
...She’s always giving off this vibe with her
disinterested look, like she’s looking down
on people.
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_2600_:
I’d say she’s really hard to handle—just
like poison...
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_2800_:
That’s why she’s the one and only partner
Pokémon for me.
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_2900_:
We’ve both got the perfect combo of cuteness and
poisonous virulence—and we’re gonna show Pasio
just how toxic we can be!
charaepi_ch0272_00_klara/2301_1201_3000_:
We’ll make this artificial island super-duper cute
with our vile poison!
